name: Super Retro Dice!
description:
New Version out Now!!

https://spherecube.itch.io/super-retro-dice-v12

For the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Super Retro Dice is a 2D solo player battle platformer where you play as a dice cube who's number of jumps is limited by the number on its face. You have a gun to shoot enemies and your objective is to collect as many green dice as possible. Good luck!
